mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO trip (trip_code, trip_name, trip_tel, trip_addr, trip_lat, trip_lon, trip_summ, trip_content, homepage, trip_region, img_gro_code, trip_date) VALUES(#{tripCode}, #{tripName}, #{tripTel}, #{tripAddr}, #{tripLat}, #{tripLon}, #{TripSumm}, #{TripContent}, #{homepage}, #{tripRegion}, #{imgGroCode}, #{tripDate})
